name: firebug
title: Firebug
description: Next Firebug generation built on top of native Firefox developer tools
author: Firebug Working Group

preferences.name: debugStartup
preferences.title: Execute start-up sequence for debugging
preferences.description: Allows performing custom startup sequence useful when debugging

preferences.name: stringCropLength
preferences.title: String cropping
preferences.description: Default length limit for cropped strings

preferences.name: displayedAttributeValueLimit
preferences.title: Attribute value length
preferences.description: Maximal number of characters for displayed attribute values inside HTML Panel

preferences.name: ObjectLongIteratorMax
preferences.title: Long iterator limit
preferences.description: How many properties to show in long object summaries

preferences.name: ObjectShortIteratorMax
preferences.title: Short iterator limit
preferences.description: How many properties to show in short object summaries

preferences.name: useDefaultLocale
preferences.title: Use (en-US) locale
preferences.description: Disregard the current Firefox locale and use (en-US) locale as default.

preferences.name: env
preferences.title: Environment mode
preferences.description: Set to 'production' by default, but you can use 'development' to get extra features for Firebug developers

preferences.name: replaceTabs
preferences.title: Number of spaces for displaying tabs
preferences.description: The number of spaces used for displaying tabs inside the Script panel

preferences.name: netexport.jsonpCallback
preferences.title: JSONP callback name for HARP files
preferences.description: Specifies JSONP callback name for HAR files wrapped in a function call (JSONP, HARP)

preferences.name: netexport.beaconServerURL
preferences.title: beaconServerURL
preferences.description: URL of the server where the collected data should be send to

preferences.name: netexport.sendToConfirmation
preferences.title: sendToConfirmation
preferences.description: Display confirmation before uploading collected data to the server yes/no

preferences.name: netexport.includeResponseBodies
preferences.title: includeResponseBodies
preferences.description: Specifies whether the response bodies of requests should be included in the export

preferences.name: netexport.saveFiles
preferences.title: saveFiles
preferences.description: If true, page resources are saved as files

preferences.name: netexport.alwaysEnableAutoExport
preferences.title: alwaysEnableAutoExport
preferences.description: Auto export feature is enabled by default

preferences.name: netexport.secretToken
preferences.title: secretToken
preferences.description: Secret token for exposing export API to the content (user page). If empty, no API are exposed

preferences.name: netexport.autoExportToFile
preferences.title: autoExportToFile
preferences.description: Auto export feature stores results into a local file

preferences.name: netexport.autoExportToServer
preferences.title: autoExportToServer
preferences.description: Auto export feature sends results to the server

preferences.name: netexport.pageLoadedTimeout
preferences.title: pageLoadedTimeout
preferences.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after the last page request to declare the page loaded

preferences.name: netexport.timeout
preferences.title: timeout
preferences.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after the page is exported even if not loaded yet. Set to zero to switch off this feature.

preferences.name: netexport.compress
preferences.title: compress
preferences.description: If true, HAR files are compressed
